definitions.definition: The act of moving from one thing to another.
examples: Make a natural progression from player to coach

definitions.definition: The act of moving forward or proceeding in a course; motion onward.
A sequence obtained by adding or multiplying each term by a constant.
The process of making an exercise more strenuous by manipulating the details of its performance like loaded weight , range of motion , angle , speed .

main_definition: The act of moving from one thing to another.
secondary_definitions: The act of moving forward or proceeding in a course; motion onward.
( mathematics ) A sequence obtained by adding or multiplying each term by a constant.
( exercise ) The process of making an exercise more strenuous by manipulating the details of its performance like loaded weight , range of motion , angle , speed .
